name: Ctrl + S the World
description:
READY TO NUM LOCK YOUR WAY TO VICTORY?
(You can only play this game if you have a keypad!)

Ctrl + S the World is a game where you navigate our little world around and use the keypad to eradicate alternate versions of the earth threatening to become the alpha! DESTROY THEM!

There's a LOT I couldn't quite fit in the time required - pause menu, some MAJOR debugging...but I'm pretty happy with my first game jam!
Thanks Ludum Dare!
